blog.name: maraudertexts
blog.title: Marauders Era Texts
blog.description: A bunch of texts, facebook posts and whatsapp messages keep getting screenshotted and put online for the world to see.

summary: Reg? I would just like to say that you shouldn’t beat yourself up about kissing James... obviously it was the wrong thing to do...
question: Reg? I would just like to say that you shouldn’t beat yourself up about kissing James... obviously it was the wrong thing to do but it was just a mistake. I don’t blame you for what you did and I don’t blame Barty for how he reacted, but I do blame James. He knew you were taken and yet still put on his flirting, teasing, and taunting demeanor that is a signature James thing and honestly in that situation I probably would have kissed him to shut him up too. And I’m a lesbian. It’s James’s fault.
answer: Regulus: I blame him and I blame myself.  And I also blame myself for the fact that I got into a relationship with Barty even though I knew I still had feelings for James AGAIN.  I did the same thing to Barty twice, and I don’t blame him if he never wants to talk to me again.

reblog.comment: Regulus: I blame him and I blame myself.  And I also blame myself for the fact that I got into a relationship with Barty even though I knew I still had feelings for James AGAIN.  I did the same thing to Barty twice, and I don’t blame him if he never wants to talk to me again.

trail.content_raw: Regulus: I blame him and I blame myself.  And I also blame myself for the fact that I got into a relationship with Barty even though I knew I still had feelings for James AGAIN.  I did the same thing to Barty twice, and I don’t blame him if he never wants to talk to me again.

summary: See what I mean Jaimie. Typical pureblood deflection. You might as well be a Malfoy. Maybe you're a long lost cousin or...
question: See what I mean Jaimie. Typical pureblood deflection. You might as well be a Malfoy. Maybe you're a long lost cousin or something. I used to have hope in you actually. Now you just disgust me.
answer: James: Excuse me, but I’m nothing like those typical purebloods.  Please don’t compare me to Malfoy.

summary: Idea. A Snarry AU where Snape is 40 year old recluse genius scientist, that never had a relationships and is a virgin. He's...
body: Idea. A Snarry AU where Snape is 40 year old recluse genius scientist, that never had a relationships and is a virgin. He’s presenting a new invention to the high society and his best friend Lucius Malfoy hires him a young escort Harry Potter. Harry teaches Snape how to dress, ride a horse, make love and then can’t bear to part with him. Snape feels the same. Features a classic bitter jaded Snape and unexpected cynic Harry.

blog.description: What do we say to the god of death? Not today. | requests: open | masterlist, faq, edits, fandoms

summary: Secrets | Remus Lupin Request: @thebookwormslytherin : Heyy!! I was wondering if you could do a remus lupin× plus size reader...
body:
Secrets | Remus Lupin

Request: @thebookwormslytherin : Heyy!! I was wondering if you could do a remus lupin× plus size reader where remus is a professor and reader is an apprentice or a fellow professor at Hogwarts and they flirt alot and you know about his condition! Also could you include hot smut and a bit of dom rem? If you don’t want smut, that’s ok too

Warnings: none

A/N: I decided to not include smut because it didn’t really fit into the one-shot. And I can’t really imagine Remus as a dom tbh. I hope you like it anyway!

Everyone has secrets. You had a few too, but secrets have to remain secrets, don’t they? If someone told you a secret, you’d never tell it anyone else. Except for your cat, maybe. 

But a secret couldn’t remain a secret when a second person knew about it. And you knew about his secret. It wasn’t normal of course but you didn’t judge him for it.Remus was still a smart, good man. You tried to help him in any way possible but there weren’t much options. At least you kept his secret a secret to anyone else. 

Secrets could also make two persons grow closer. And they definitely did that with you and the geeky professor. It was about time and clear, you would start to like each other.

You accepted him and he accepted you in every way. Your personality, your body, everything. He loved your curves, secretly, but he still was terrible when it came to flirts.

Your job as a professor at Hogwarts opened new doors for you. Not just only in the work business but also in your personal life. Except of all the experiences you made by every student being different and the secrets in Hogwarts, you met new people. Including him.

With time, it became a thing for you two to, whenever your ways crossed, flirt with each other and take your time to eye the other one up.

You entered the classroom, only a few students of the precious class were still there. But they also left soon, leaving you and the professor alone. “I’m not a fan of having first graders in my class”, you smiled, taking a few steps closer and looking around in the room that looked the same as always.

“I don’t have any problems with them. They’re still enthusiastic and not like the older, boring students.” A small smirk found his way to Remus’ lips while he kept his eyes on you, letting them wander from your face, down to your curves.

“What about if you make me enthusiastic again because I’m way older than the oldest students?” It was a bad attempt to make him go out with you, or even just spending some private time together.

“I’d love to.”

You smiled but you were also shocked that it actually worked. “I mean, how could I say no to such a beautiful and intelligent woman?”

“Right, how could you say no?”

blog.name: homestuckexamination
blog.title: Let Me Tell You About Homestuck
blog.description:
A blog all about clearing up misconceptions about the Webcomic Homestuck, and to a lesser extent, the Game Hiveswap.What's Canon and what's popular Fanon? What exactly happened with all the Weird Time and Plot Shit? When did a character do something? And why does it Keep Happening? Be it a general Question, Resources or Help in trying to get into the comic yourself, you'll find it here.

If you need help regarding Classpects, feel free to follow the link below to my Classpect Analysis Masterpost.

Also, I've got a Patreon now!

summary: broadly speaking, what aspects do you think would be most common in each hogwarts house? i know that two players of the same...
question: broadly speaking, what aspects do you think would be most common in each hogwarts house? i know that two players of the same aspect could be radically different, but, like, play along here- it's just for fun, anyway. (also thanks for taking up the classpect initiative. you're doing god's/hussie's work <3)
answer:
No probs! Sadly I just. Don’t know enough about Hogwarts houses, I was never a Harry Potter fan. From what I know as an outsider though- Umm…

Gryffindor would be Time, Breath and Heart.

Ravenclaw would be Light, Mind and Space.

Slytherin would be Rage, Void and Doom.

Hufflepuff would be Hope, Blood and Life.

blog.name: jcinkgalore
blog.title: jcink galore
blog.description: jcink galore is a jcink resource tumblr for roleplay advertising and player interaction. we feature an advertising base, as well as a way to build community between jcink roleplayers. we only accept jcink hosted sites.

summary:
ROWLING’S WORLD. YOUR CHARACTERS.
 POTTERVERSE ϟ ADVANCED ϟ JCINK PREMIUM ϟ 13+ YEARS
 Ever wanted to invent your own potions...
caption:
ROWLING’S WORLD. YOUR CHARACTERS.

POTTERVERSE ϟ ADVANCED ϟ JCINK PREMIUM ϟ 13+ YEARS

Ever wanted to invent your own potions professor? Keen to explore crime in Knockturn Alley? Curious about the life of a St. Mungo’s healer? Want to write the life of a world-famous quidditch star? Author an auror’s fall from grace? All this and more is possible at JACFC! If you’re not sure where to begin, we’ve got loads of flexible, diverse CHARACTER REQUESTS waiting.

13 years online proves something magical is happening at JACFC!

summary:
Ron: So we have to save the world?
Harry: Yeah.
Ron: How are we gonna do that?
Harry: Well, like we always do. Hermione will...
body:
Ron: So we have to save the world?

Harry: Yeah.

Ron: How are we gonna do that?

Harry: Well, like we always do. Hermione will figure out a great plan, something will go terribly wrong, we’ll blow some shit up, things will come together somehow and I’ll be the hero.

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

blog.name: blissdaisies
blog.description: This is a writing/fandom blog. :)

summary: Happiness, to Harry, is the joy and adrenaline rush of taking off on his broom. It’s eating treacle tart for breakfast and the...
body:
Happiness, to Harry, is the joy and adrenaline rush of taking off on his broom. It’s eating treacle tart for breakfast and the smirk Ginny gives him when she thinks he’s acting funny. It’s the laughter of his friends echoing off the walls of his home and the first cries of his newborn children.

Happiness, to Ginny, is curling up on the couch with Harry and watching old black-and-white Muggle films. It’s patting her Pygmy Puff and the indescribable feeling of scoring a goal in Quidditch. It’s the sounds of her brothers doing random everyday things like squabbling over who gets the last piece of pie.

Happiness, to Hermione, is the peace and tranquility of reading a good book at night. It’s the goofy smile Ron gives her when they snuggle together at night. It’s stroking Crookshanks and watching Harry and Ron amusedly as they play a game of Gobstones.

Happiness, to Ron, is home cooked meals by Molly and eating dinner surrounded by his sizeable family. It’s the small smile Hermione gives him when she thinks he is hilarious but doesn’t want to show it. It’s playing Quidditch in the backyard with Harry and his siblings.

Happiness, to Draco, is watching Astoria, with their son in her arms, sleeping peacefully early in the morning. It’s having tea with Narcissa every Saturday afternoon and the light kiss his wife gives him every night before bed.

Happiness, to Neville, is remembering how far he’s come since he was a scared eleven-year-old. Its being in the greenhouse, surrounded by the familiar earthy smell. It’s Professor Sprout’s praise about his prowess in Herbology. It’s gaining the respect of his peers and his grandmother.

Happiness, to Luna, is meeting Rolf for the first time and feeling like she’s met someone who really gets her. It’s being surrounded by her friends who may not really understand her quirks but love her in spite of, no, because of them. It’s discussing the existence of Wrackspurts with her father on Sunday mornings while crafting herself new radish earrings.

blog.name: dudha-mata
blog.title: Milky
blog.description: 18 | Christian | INFP | Ravenclaw | UK | She/Her | Bi

body:
Love Potions

I’ve just realised something about the Harry Potter films that utterly disgusts me: the way they handle love potions.

Bc of the way they make it so Ron is the butt of the joke whenever he’s supposed to do something heroic or something tragic is supposed to happen to him, the message behind the love potions becomes greatly distorted.

In the books, they cause havoc. Romilda Vane is being really creepy and trying to smuggle one to Harry, which Hermione warns him about and he takes very seriously and it makes him extremely uncomfortable (as it would, if you found out someone was trying to make you “fall in love with them without your consent). However, in the film, this scene is played for laughs, as Harry, instead of being extremely uncomfortable and wary, takes a liking to Romilda and gets all big headed.

Later, in the books, we see Ron recieve the effects of the love potion, on his birthday, no less. We see him become strangely out of character and, while JK does disgustingly play it for laughs, it’s nowhere near as bad as how the movie portrays this scene. However, at least, in the books, Harry actually seems quite concerned about his friend, and not just weirded out. But bc the audience is used to seeing Ron sat whimpering and whining in the background, this scene is funny, in the movie. The audience isn’t particularly concerned about Ron, which is disturbing bc a girl has made him become this way without his consent.

It’s strange how seriously the books don’t treat Ron being on the receiving end of a love potion, considering how we learn, in the same book, about how this is how Merope Gaunt tricked Tom Riddle to "fall in love with her” and how Voldemort was conceived under a love potion. But as the scene where discover this is left our of the film, then the connotations of it become much less serious and allows them to treat the topic of humorous.

It’s extra scary because changes like this are usually just passed off as things being lost in adaptation, but, in doing this, they’ve changed a big theme of the book and an extremely important one and, in doing this, they’ve made the topic of being forced to do things with our your consent is funny (at least if it’s a male who has a lack of consent).

Anyway, it’s absolutely disgusting the way the films do this and just makes the topics of rape and sexual assault/harassment seem much less serious than they are, which is a big problem.

(Idk if my main point is exactly coherent in this; it’s my first time writing a post like this, but basically they changed the whole love potions thing from serious to funny in the film, which is freaking disgusting)
